form_data.form_description: Extract comprehensive patient medical history, current conditions, medications, and clinical assessments from medical records

fields.extraction_hints: Look in patient demographics or header section

decomposition.reasoning_trace:
Step 1: Field Inventory - Found 2 fields in form_data: patient_age (number type) and patient_gender (enum type with options).

Step 2: Cognitive Behavior Analysis - patient_age is a direct numeric extraction (extract age value from demographics section). patient_gender is a classification into predefined categories (Male/Female/Other/Not specified) from demographics section.

Step 3: Grouping Decision - Created 2 signatures by grouping fields with same cognitive behavior: ExtractNumericFields for the numeric extraction (patient_age) and ClassifyEnumFields for the enum classification (patient_gender). Both are independent extractions from the document with no dependencies on other fields.

Step 4: Verification - All 2 fields covered, no duplicates, no dependencies needed as both are direct extractions from source document.

patient_age.extraction_hints: Look in patient demographics or header section
